posts.post_content: Mechanically, it might have fit in Scars block, but the name would have been a problem for creative. A big part of the plot for Scars was the rebirth of Phyrexia with no contact with the original beyond the initial infusion of oil (and some of Karn's ravings). Having a gate to Phyrexia available would have made it the story of how Phyrexia was recolonised, rather than how Mirrodin was corrupted...

posts.post_content: I don't think this is so bad if you have [Bitterblossom](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bitterblossom) . [Phyrexian Tribute](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Phyrexian Tribute) is another one you can use. [Curse Artifact](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Curse Artifact) is another. Gate is by the most playable one. For the same reason that [Koskun Falls](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Koskun Falls) is not a horrible inclusion if you are playing monoblack anyway there is little else to use.
posts.html:
I don't think this is so bad if you have Bitterblossom . Phyrexian Tribute is another one you can use. Curse Artifact is another. Gate is by the most playable one. For the same reason that Koskun Falls is not a horrible inclusion if you are playing monoblack anyway there is little else to use.

Posted By: Hovercraft (11/26/2010 3:31:30 PM)
Rating:

Was and still is one of the few ways monoblack can deal with non-creature artifacts. It was also fairly useful back in the day when Terror was the go-to black killspell, giving you a viable option for killing artifact creatures.

It's still good sideboard material for either monoblack or any deck running black with a lot of creatures/graveyard recursion. The one-per-turn limit on its use is a little weird, but without it the card could get ridiculous. With the limit in place its {B}{B} cost is just perfect.

@GainsBanding: No idea on Unlimited, but my Revised rulebook says in a few places that creatures can only be sacrificed if they aren't "already on the way to the graveyard".

Posted By: Ninjacat (9/24/2012 2:14:57 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
To the [Gate to Phyrexia](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gate to Phyrexia) rides the [Knight Exemplar](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Knight Exemplar), her [War Hawk](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=War Hawk) perched on her wrist, her [Attended Knight](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Attended Knight) bearing a proud [Capashen Standard](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Capashen Standard), fluttering in the breeze as she surveys the [Tainted Field](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tainted Field) before her. The [Ring of Thune](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ring of Thune) she wears glints in the [Serene Sunset](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Serene Sunset) as she hefts her [Loxodon Warhammer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Loxodon Warhammer) and shoulders her [Angelic Armaments](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Angelic Armaments), gifts from [Avacyn](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Avacyn) herself.  
  
"[Rally](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rally)!" she cries to her [Elite Vanguard](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elite Vanguard). "[Rally the Troops](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rally the Troops), and alert [General Jarkeld](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=General Jarkeld) that this [Foul Presence](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Foul Presence) will soon be [Purge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Purge)d from the [Living Lands](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Living Lands)!"  
  
"[Death or Glory](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Death or Glory)!"
posts.html:
To the Gate to Phyrexia rides the Knight Exemplar, her War Hawk perched on her wrist, her Attended Knight bearing a proud Capashen Standard, fluttering in the breeze as she surveys the Tainted Field before her. The Ring of Thune she wears glints in the Serene Sunset as she hefts her Loxodon Warhammer and shoulders her Angelic Armaments, gifts from Avacyn herself.

"Rally!" she cries to her Elite Vanguard. "Rally the Troops, and alert General Jarkeld that this Foul Presence will soon be Purged from the Living Lands!"

"Death or Glory!"
